Key: (Hmmm. Is he not over here either?)
Are you okaaaay?! If you're here, say something!

Jeez, I can't find him. Where'd that bastard
go?
Translation:
Cielos, no puedo encontrarlo.
¿Dónde ha ido ese bastardo?

Key:
Wait. Don't tell me he was actually...
Nah. Tonomachi made up the whole
Tengu Cow" story himself."
Translation:
Espera. No me digas que en realidad estaba…
No. Tonomachi se inventó toda la historia
De la "Vaca Tengu"".

Key:
B-Besides, there's no such thing as ghosts.
Even if there was, I'm not scared of—
Translation:
A-Además, los fantasmas no existen.  Aunque
Existieran, no me asustan...

Key:
K-Kotori...? Huh? Your ribbon, did you change
it?

Y-You said you'd protect me, but you left
me alone. Who the hell do you think you
are?!
Translation:
Dijiste que me protegerías, pero me dejaste sola.
¡¿Quién demonios te crees que eres?!

Key:
You went off on your own...
WHAT WERE YOU THINKING?!
Translation:
Te fuiste por tu cuenta…
¡¿EN QUÉ ESTABAS PENSANDO?!

Key:
O-Oh, sorry. Instead of following me, wouldn't
it be less scary if you were with the others?
Translation:
O-Oh, lo siento. En vez de seguirme, ¿no daría
Menos miedo si estuvieras con los demás?

Key: I-It... has to be you, Shido.

Y-You promised! So you have to bear the
responsibility and stay close to me!
Translation:
¡Lo prometiste! ¡Así que tienes que asumir la
Responsabilidad y permanecer cerca de mí!

Key:
(Kotori seems incensed. She's never liked
scary stuff, but it won't be good if she gets
too stressed.)
Translation:
(Kotori parece indignada. Nunca le han gustado
las cosas que dan miedo, pero no será bueno
Que se estrese demasiado).

Key:
(Was it a mistake for me to bring her
with me...? I have to focus on keeping
her calm.)
Translation:
(¿Fue un error traerla conmigo...? Tengo que
Concentrarme en mantenerla calmada).

Key: Okay. I won't leave you alone anymore.
Translation: Vale. No te dejaré solo nunca más.

Key:
Really. I'll be right beside you. So come on,
let's go.
Translation:
De verdad. Estaré a tu lado. Así que venga,
Vamos.

Key:
Um. If you pull too hard on my sleeve, it'll
stretch my shirt out.
Translation:
Um. Si tiras demasiado fuerte de mi manga,
Se estirará mi camisa.

Key:
Beats me. Maybe the wind whistled through
the grass.
Translation:
No lo sé. Tal vez el viento silbaba a través
De la hierba.

Key:
Kotori, if you cling to me like that, I can't
keep walking...
Translation:
Kotori, si te aferras a mí así, no puedo
Seguir caminando...

Key: J-Just shut up! And stay still for a second.
Translation: ¡Sólo cállate! Y quédate quieto un segundo.

Key: You... don't have act so tough, you know.
Translation: Tú... no tienes que actuar tan duro, sabes.

Key:
When you were little, whenever you were
scared, you'd cling to me like this, wouldn't
you?
Translation:
Cuando eras pequeña, siempre que tenías miedo,
Te aferrabas a mí así, ¿verdad?

Key:
Whenever that happened, I'd pat your head
just like this, and you'd calm down after.
Translation:
Siempre que eso ocurría, te daba una palmadita
En la cabeza así, y después te calmabas.

Key:
You ascended as the commander of the
Ratatoskr. It seems like you've been working
so hard in the name of duty, but...
Translation:
Ascendiste como comandante del Ratatoskr.
Parece que has trabajado mucho en
Nombre del deber, pero...

Key:
This, to me, feels like spending precious time
with my little sister. Nothing's changed.
Translation:
Esto, para mí, es como pasar un tiempo precioso
Con mi hermana pequeña. Nada ha cambiado.

Key:
It's okay. I'm here. Everything's going to be
okay.
Translation: No pasa nada. Ya estoy aquí. Todo va a ir bien.

Key:
Hey, Shido! You were taking your time, so
we came over!
Translation:
¡Eh, Shido! ¡Te estabas tomando tu tiempo,
Así que vinimos!

Key:
Oh. Kotori has been with you, has she? I was
beginning to worry because we couldn't find
you.
Translation:
Oh. Kotori ha estado contigo, ¿verdad?
Empezaba a preocuparme porque no
Podíamos encontrarte.

Key:
S-Sorry. I got lost, and Kotori came looking
for me.
Translation: Lo siento. Me perdí, y Kotori vino a buscarme.

Key:
I see. Happy to see you've reunited. Now,
let's move on!
Translation:
Ya veo. Me alegra ver que se han reunido.
¡Ahora, sigamos adelante!

Key:
Seriously, though. Anyone see Tonomachi?
Damn it.
Translation:
En serio. ¿Alguien vio a Tonomachi?
Maldita sea.
